alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:22AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian and Le Flore Counties through 845 AM CST... At 822 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong showers along a line extending from near Bokoshe to 4 miles north of Wister to 3 miles northwest of Muse. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Greenwood... Pocola... Heavener... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Bokoshe... Midland... Cameron... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Lake Wister State Park... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 10 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
